author: William Worrall
title: Game Workers Unite Are Right About the Flaws Exposed by COVID-19
description: COVID-19 is revealing some pretty critical issues in the games industry. Game Workers Unite wants us to set it right. With games consistently setting new sales records, we should be taking care of everyone. The post Game Workers Unite Are Right About the Flaw…
content:
• COVID-19 is having a massive effect on the games industry.
  • Game Workers Unite have asked for people to take more care of all of our workers.
  • GWU is entirely correct, and its time to start thinking about the changes we need to make.
